content: Would it be possible to modify rustc to, on a specific target triple, to use "XPACI" instructions before calling ANY extern (non-Rust) pointer?
Whether an fn pointer comes from an external library isn't known statically, so you need to be fine with some Rust calls also getting it
And you probably need an LLVM feature that does this, I suppose
yeah I just wanna vomit XPACI calls onto every instruction pointer
